title: Virginia Tech falls to Texas 81-73 in first round of NCAA Tournament - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech falls to Texas 81-73 in first round of NCAA Tournament  VT hokiesports.com
description: Andrew Jones scored 21 points, Marcus Carr beat the halftime buzzer with a shot from well beyond halfcourt to put Texas ahead for good, and the Longhorns beat Virginia Tech 81-73 on Friday for their first NCAA Tournament victory since 2014.
